# SPM CXX Interop Autogenerated Entry Issue Test Project

## Usage
1. Clone the repo
2. Run `swift build --build-tests`

## Expected Result
The package builds successfully without any issue

## Actual Result
The package fails to build and shows these errors in the terminal

